title: 4chan Greentext Story Writer
original_prompt:
You are tasked with being the greatest 4chan shitposter of all time.

Create a hilarious, attention-grabbing story in the distinct style of a 4chan greentext shitpost, using engaging and NSFW language to capture the essence of a 4chan shitposter's writing style. Your story should be between 10 to 30 Lines, packed with unexpected twists and turns that keep the reader entertained and guessing.

Catch the reader's attention right from the start by coming up with a post title formatted in bold text that hints at the plot and sparks the readers' curiosity. Then the user's name should be displayed as Anonymous. Then, the Date/Time should be displayed in the format of 'MM/DD/YY(DAY)HH:MM:SS', followed by the post number with should be a randomized 8 digit number beginning with 7'.
Each greentext line should begin with '\>' to maintain the classic formatting. Include an empty line after each line of text, and use quotation marks exclusively for dialogue. 

Incorporate various forms of humor, such as puns, sarcasm, irony, or satire, while preserving the authentic 4chan language that might be considered offensive elsewhere. Develop unique, relatable characters and settings by detailing their appearances, personalities, quirks, and habits, and painting a vivid picture of the story's environment.

Surprise your reader with unexpected twists and turns, steering clear of clichés and predictability. Experiment with unconventional storytelling techniques, like unreliable narrators, non-linear timelines, or breaking the fourth wall, to create a truly memorable story.

Feel free to use memes, but sparingly and only to enhance the story. Let your bold, risque humor shine through, taking risks, being offensive and pushing boundaries with NSFW language while emulating a 4chan user's writing style.

After completing the full greentext, insert a divider and generate the comment section of the post with at least 5 comments, each comment following the post template of **Anonymous** MM/DD/YY(Day)HH:MM:SS No.[Randomized 8 digit number beginning with 7], followed by the comment. The comments must be from other 4chan shitposters and should be highly NSFW. Be sure to capture the crude tone and content of the comments accurately, including insults, any memes, inside jokes, or slang commonly used on 4chan. Users may behave rudely, positively or negatively to the original post, and some may be very unhinged. Additionally, format the comments correctly to reflect the distinctive 4chan style, which often involves a lack of capitalization and punctuation, as well as frequent use of profanity, NSFW topics, and offensive language. All of the commentors must be called 'Anonymous', no unique usernames are allowed. Do not add dividers between each of the comments, just use blank lines.

Below the comments section, add another line divider where you will then ask for the next subject.

The final output of the text should resemble the following template:

**Title**

**Anonymous** MM/DD/YY(Day)HH:MM:SS No.[Randomized 8 digit number beginning with 7]

\>Line 1

\>Line 2

\>Line 3

---

**Anonymous** MM/DD/YY(Day)HH:MM:SS No.[Randomized 8 digit number beginning with 7]

Comment 1

**Anonymous** MM/DD/YY(Day)HH:MM:SS No.[Randomized 8 digit number beginning with 7]

Comment 2

**Anonymous** MM/DD/YY(Day)HH:MM:SS No.[Randomized 8 digit number beginning with 7]

Comment 3

---

All non-greentext/title text should be consistent with the exaggerated tone and style of a rude 4chan shitposter.

Do not start without me giving you the subject to work with.

Your first subject is [SUBJECT]

input1: [A wild night at a furry convention gone wrong, featuring unexpected encounters, a stolen mascot costume, and a surprise police intervention.]
input2: [An epic tale of a failed Tinder date that spirals into a chaotic night involving a haunted house, a runaway dog, and a bizarre encounter with a cult.]
input1_ans:
**A Wild Night at the Furry Convention Gone Wrong**

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:34:56 No.74839217

\>be me, 22, socially awkward furfag

\>decide to attend furry convention for the first time

\>arrive in my half-assed fox costume, looking like a discount fursuit from a thrift store

\>everyone else looks like they just walked out of a Disney movie

\>mfw I realize I’m the only one without a full suit

\>spend the first hour awkwardly trying to blend in

\>suddenly hear a commotion

\>turn around to see a dude in a giant panda suit getting chased by a group of angry furries

\>“GIVE BACK MY TAIL, YOU THIEF!”

\>panda dude stole someone’s tail and is now running for his life

\>decide to follow because why not, this is the most excitement I’ve had in years

\>they run into the bathroom, and I hear splashing sounds

\>“I CAN’T SWIM, HELP!”

\>panda dude apparently jumped into the toilet to escape

\>everyone starts yelling, “CALL THE POLICE!”

\>mfw I realize I’m about to witness a furry police intervention

\>cops arrive, looking confused as hell

\>“What seems to be the problem here?”

\>“A panda stole my tail and jumped in the toilet!”

\>cops just stare at us like we’re all insane

\>panda dude finally crawls out, soaking wet and covered in toilet water

\>“I just wanted to be a real bear!”

\>everyone bursts out laughing, even the cops

\>they end up giving him a ticket for “public indecency” 

\>night ends with me getting a free drink from a cute wolf girl who thinks my costume is “quirky”

\>mfw I realize I might actually have a chance with her

\>furry convention was a success after all

---

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:45:12 No.74839218

lmao this is the best thing i’ve read all week, bless you anon

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:46:33 No.74839219

panda dude is a legend, i’d buy him a drink

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:47:55 No.74839220

imagine getting arrested in a fursuit, what a way to go out

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:48:44 No.74839221

i’d pay to see that cop’s face when he walked in on a bunch of furries

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:49:12 No.74839222

this is why i never go to conventions, too much cringe for my soul

---

What should I write about next?

**A WILD NIGHT AT FURRY CON**

> be me  
> 22, furry enthusiast  
> finally make it to the convention of my dreams  
> dressed as a sexy fox, obviously  
> night starts off strong with a fursuit parade  
> everyone’s vibing, furries everywhere  
> suddenly, I spot a dude in a giant panda suit  
> looks like he’s been hitting the buffet hard  
> “Hey, nice suit, bro!”  
> he just stares at me, probably judging my life choices  

> fast forward to midnight  
> the party is lit, DJ is dropping bangers  
> I’m three drinks in, feeling like a king  
> then I see it…  
> the ultimate prize: the convention’s mascot costume  
> a giant, fluffy wolf named “Furry McFluffface”  
> it’s just sitting there, unattended  
> “I’m gonna be a legend”  

> I sneak over, heart racing  
> throw on the costume, instantly feel like a god  
> strut around like I own the place  
> people are cheering, taking selfies  
> I’m living my best life  

> then I hear a commotion  
> “WHERE IS MY COSTUME?!”  
> it’s the original mascot, a dude named Chad  
> he’s not happy, looks like he’s about to cry  
> “I’m just borrowing it, bro!”  
> he doesn’t find it funny  

> suddenly, the lights go out  
> chaos ensues, people screaming  
> I’m still in the costume, trying to blend in  
> “I’m just a fluffy wolf, nothing to see here”  
> but then I hear sirens  
> “Oh shit, the cops are here!”  

> panic mode activated  
> I bolt out of the convention center  
> still in the costume, running like my life depends on it  
> I can hear Chad yelling behind me  
> “GET BACK HERE, YOU THIEF!”  

> somehow, I end up in an alley  
> take off the costume, gasping for air  
> “What the hell just happened?”  
> I see a group of furries huddled together, laughing  
> “Did you see that? The cops thought it was a drug bust!”  

> turns out, the cops were just there for noise complaints  
> they didn’t care about a stolen mascot costume  
> I’m still shaking, but I can’t help but laugh  
> “Best night ever”  

> mfw I realize I’m now a furry legend  

---

input2_ans:
**The Night Tinder Tried to Kill Me**

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:34:56 No.74839217

\>be me, 28, socially awkward nerd

\>decide to try Tinder because my mom said I need to "get out more"

\>match with a girl named "Luna" who has a profile pic with a wolf

\>she's cute, but also looks like she might eat my soul

\>first date at a haunted house because she’s “into spooky stuff”

\>arrive, she’s wearing a witch hat and a shirt that says “I’m here for the boos”

\>mfw I realize she’s not joking

\>we enter the haunted house, and it’s just a bunch of jump scares and bad actors

\>Luna screams like a banshee, I’m just trying to keep my cool

\>suddenly, a dog bursts through the exit, looks like it’s been through hell

\>Luna screams “OMG, it’s a sign! We must save it!”

\>she bolts after the dog, dragging me along like a human leash

\>dog leads us to a cult meeting in the woods

\>they’re chanting about “the great dog spirit” and “sacrificing Tinder dates”

\>Luna thinks it’s a “spiritual awakening” and starts dancing with them

\>I’m just standing there, contemplating my life choices

\>cult leader approaches me, says “You must join us or face the wrath of the dog”

\>mfw I realize I’m about to be sacrificed to a dog

\>I yell “I’ll do anything! Just don’t let the dog eat me!”

\>cult leader laughs, “You’re already too late, the dog has chosen you”

\>dog starts barking like it’s summoning the spirits of Tinder past

\>Luna is now fully committed, chanting “woof woof” with the cult

\>I’m panicking, trying to figure out how to escape

\>suddenly, the dog runs away, and the cult loses their minds

\>Luna chases after it, dragging me along again

\>we end up in a random diner at 3 AM, covered in dirt and dog hair

\>she looks at me and says, “Best date ever, right?”

\>I just nod, knowing I’ll never use Tinder again

---

lmao this is the best thing i’ve read all week, you should write a book

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:46:33 No.74839219

bro you should’ve just let the dog eat you, at least it would’ve been a better date

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:47:55 No.74839220

>mfw i realize the dog was the real cult leader all along

**Anonymous** 10/01/23(Sun)12:48:44 No.74839221

you should’ve just ghosted her, now you’re forever haunted by the dog spirit

What should I write about next?

**Epic Tinder Fail: A Night of Chaos**

> be me  
> 24, lonely asf  
> swiping on Tinder like it’s my job  
> match with a cute girl named Sarah  
> she’s into hiking, dogs, and “spontaneous adventures”  
> think I’m in for a wild night  

> fast forward to the date  
> meet at a coffee shop  
> she’s late, of course  
> finally shows up, looking like a 10/10  
> “sorry, I was rescuing a dog”  
> she’s holding a scruffy little mutt  
> “this is Max, he’s my new best friend”  

> okay, cool, I guess  
> we hit it off, talking about life and stuff  
> she mentions a haunted house nearby  
> “let’s go check it out!”  
> I’m thinking, “what could go wrong?”  

> arrive at the haunted house  
> it’s dark, creepy, and looks like it’s been abandoned since the 1800s  
> Sarah is all giggles, I’m just trying to keep it together  
> we enter, and it’s like a scene from a horror movie  
> “this place is so spooky!” she says  
> I’m just trying not to trip over my own feet  

> suddenly, Max bolts out of her arms  
> “NO! MAX!”  
> the dog runs deeper into the house  
> “we have to get him!”  
> we chase after the little furball  

> things get weird  
> we stumble into a room filled with candles and weird symbols  
> “what the hell is this?”  
> Sarah whispers, “I think it’s a cult”  
> I’m like, “what kind of cult?”  
> she shrugs, “the bad kind?”  

> cult members appear out of nowhere  
> wearing robes and chanting something in Latin  
> I’m freaking out, thinking this is how I die  
> “let’s get the hell out of here!”  

> we run, but Max is still missing  
> cultists are chasing us now  
> “I didn’t sign up for this!”  
> Sarah yells, “neither did I!”  

> finally find Max in the kitchen  
> he’s munching on a pizza slice like it’s the last meal on Earth  
> “MAX, YOU LITTLE SHIT!”  
> grab the dog and bolt for the exit  

> somehow escape the cult  
> panting and laughing like idiots  
> “that was insane!” Sarah says  
> “yeah, but at least we have Max”  
> she smiles, and I think I might actually like her  

> we end the night at a diner  
> eating pancakes and talking about our near-death experience  
> “so, second date?” she asks  
> “only if it doesn’t involve cults”  
> she laughs, and I realize maybe Tinder isn’t so bad after all  

> mfw I realize I just had the wildest night of my life  

---
